article.title: Alutiiq Supports Redstone Arsenal
article.text: Alutiiq Diversified Services LLC, Anchorage, Alaska was awarded a $6,989,861 firm-fixed-price bridge contract for Redstone Information Technology Services to maintain operational continuity until the selection board has evaluated contractor proposals. Army Contracting Command, Redstone Arsenal, Ala. is the contracting activity (W9124P-14-C-0023).
